name: @gitmesh/signal-enrichment-worker
description: Signal enrichment worker for processing activities with identity resolution, embedding generation, deduplication, and classification

scripts.start: SERVICE=signal-enrichment-worker TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register src/main.ts
scripts.start:debug:local: set -a && . ../../../backend/.env.dist.local && . ../../../backend/.env.override.local && set +a && SERVICE=signal-enrichment-worker TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true LOG_LEVEL=trace node --inspect=0.0.0.0:9231 -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register src/main.ts
scripts.start:debug: SERVICE=signal-enrichment-worker TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true LOG_LEVEL=trace node --inspect=0.0.0.0:9231 -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register src/main.ts
scripts.start:temporal-worker: SERVICE=temporal-worker TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register src/bin/temporalWorker.ts
scripts.script:enrich-batch: SERVICE=script TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register src/bin/enrichBatch.ts
scripts.script:run-clustering: SERVICE=script TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register src/bin/runClustering.ts
scripts.script:trigger-workflow: SERVICE=script TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register src/bin/triggerWorkflow.ts
scripts.script:validate-implementation: SERVICE=script TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register src/bin/validateImplementation.ts
scripts.script:observability-demo: SERVICE=script TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register src/bin/observabilityDemo.ts
